S04n267:751: na (ca) kaścit teṣāṃ trātā bhavati tatra te nirāśāḥ paridevante narakeṣu prapatamānāḥ tad akalyāṇamitravaśena draṣṭavyaṃ |
S04n267:752: ye sattvā vāksucaritaṃ bhāṣante teṣāṃ na śakyaṃ puṇyaskandhasyopamāṃ kartuṃ |
S04n267:754: [116] yadā kalyāṇamitraṃ paśyati tadā tathāgato dṛṣṭo bhavati |
S04n267:760: tadā jaṃbūdvīpakanāṃ sattvānāṃ sukhasya na śakyamupamāṃ kartumevamevāyaṃ sarvaśūra saṃghāṭo dharmaparyāya jaṃbūdvīpakānāṃ sattvānāṃ buddhakṛtyaṃ karoti |
S04n267:761: tadā na śakyaṃ teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ puṇyaskandhasyopamāṃ kartum
S04n267:762: [117] tadyathāpi nāma sarvaśūra yatremāḥ paṃca mahānadyaḥ saṃbhedaṃ samavasaraṇaṃ gacchanti |
S04n267:764: etāvadudakakuṃbhā vā udakakuṃbhaśatāni vā udakakuṃbhasahasrāṇi vā udakakuṃbhaśatasahasrāṇi vā |
S04n267:765: api tu bahutvādudakasya mahān udakaskandha iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati |
S04n267:766: [118] evameva sarvaśūra yadā jaṃbūdvīpakā sattvā imaṃ saṃghātaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śroṣyanti |
S04n267:769: pareṣāṃ ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyanti pratipatyā ca saṃpādayiṣyanti |
S04n267:770: tadā na śakyaṃ teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ puṇyaskandhasya pramāṇaṃ udgrahītumapi tu bahutvāt puṇyasya mahān puṇyaskandha iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati |
S04n267:771: [119] ye sarvaśūra sattvāḥ saṃghāṭaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ na śroṣyanti na taiḥ śakyamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum na śakyaṃ dharmacakraṃ pravartayitum na śakyaṃ dharmagaṇḍī parāhanitum na śakyaṃ tairdharmasiṃhāsanamabhiroḍhuṃ na śakyaṃ (tai)
S04n267:773: na śakyamaprameyai raśmibhiravabhāsayitum ya imaṃ sarvaśūra saṃghāṭaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ na śroṣyanti na śakyaṃ tairbodhimaṇḍe niṣattuṃ |
S04n267:774: [120] sarvaśūra āha - pṛcchāmi bhagavaṃ pṛcchāmi sugata,
S04n267:776: bhagavān āha - pṛccha tvaṃ sarvaśūra yad yad evākāṃkṣasyahaṃ te niṣkāṃkṣaṃ kariṣyāmi
S04n267:777: (sarvaśūra) āha - katamaḥ sa bhagavan ṛṣirabhūd yena te sattvāḥ paṃcabhirānantaryaiḥ karmabhiḥ parimokṣitāḥ avaivarttikabhūmau ca pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ
S04n267:779: (50) sūkṣmaṃ vacana buddhānāṃ sarvaśūra śṛṇohi me
S04n267:783: (52) buddho darśayate rūpaṃ dharman deśayate svayam
S04n267:787: buddhas tatra bhaven nityaṃ saṃghāṭaṃ yatra tiṣṭhati |
S04n267:789: bhūtapūrvaṃ sarvaśūrātīte dhvani navānavatyasaṃkhyeyaṅ kalpān anusmarāmi |
S04n267:790: (tatra) dvādaśa buddhakoṭya babhūvan ratnottamanāmānastathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ ahaṃ tena kālena tena samayena pradānaśūro bhūvaṃ candra nāma |
S04n267:791: te ca me dvādaśa buddhakoṭya paryupāsitāḥ khādanīyabhojanīyamālyagandhavilepanena yathāsukhaṃ |
S04n267:792: praṇītenāhāreṇa sarvasukhopadhānenopasthitāḥ upasthāpya ca tatraiva mayā sarvaśūra vyākaraṇamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratilabdham
S04n267:793: [122] abhijānāmyahaṃ sarvaśūrāṣṭādaśa buddhakoṭya sarve ratnāvabhāsanāmānastathāgatā loka utpannā abhūvan tatrāhamapi pradānaśūro bhūvan garbhaseno nāma |
S04n267:794: te cāṣṭādaśa buddhakoṭyo mayā paryupāsitāḥ pūjitāśca |
S04n267:795: yathā tathāgatānāṃ pratyarhaṃ gandhamālyavilepanālaṃkāravibhūṣaṇaiḥ tatra ca me vyākaraṇamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratilabdhaṃ |
S04n267:796: [123] anusmarāmyahaṃ sarvaśūra viṣmaśatirbuddhakoṭyaḥ śikhisaṃbhavanāmānastathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā loka udapadyanta,
S04n267:797: pūjitā me te buddhā bhagavanto yathā pratyarheṇa pūjasatkāreṇa tatraiva ca me vyākaraṇamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratilabdham na cādyāpi kālasamayamabhūdvyākaraṇāya ||
S04n267:798: [124] anusmarāmyahaṃ sarvaśūra viṃśatyeva buddhakoṭyaḥ kāśyapa nāmānastathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā loka udapadyantaḥ tatrāhamapi pradānaśūro bhūvan
S04n267:800: gandhena mālyena vilepanena tathāgatagurūpasthānenopasthitāḥ yathā tathāgatānāṃ gurugauravaṃ kartavyaṃ tathā kṛtaṃ |
S04n267:801: tatraiva ca me vyākaraṇamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratilabdhaṃ |
S04n267:802: [125] anusmarāmyahaṃ sarvaśūra ṣoḍaśa buddhakoṭyo bhūvan vimalaprabhāsanāmāna tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ tena ca kālena tena samayenāhaṃ gṛhapatirabhūvadāḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogaḥ sarvasvaparityāgī (mahātyāgī |) |
S04n267:803: te ca mayā ṣoḍaśa buddhakoṭyaḥ pūjitā āstaraṇaprāvaraṇena gandhena mālyena vilepanena vibhūṣaṇācchādanena ca |
S04n267:804: yathā tathāgatānāṃ gurūpasthānaṃ (kartavyaṃ tathā ca mayā) kṛtaṃ |
S04n267:805: tatraiva ca me vyākaraṇamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratilabdhaṃ |
S04n267:806: na ca me kālaṃ na samayamabhūdvyākaraṇāya ||
S04n267:807: [126] śṛṇu sarvaśūrānusmarāmyahaṃ paṃcanavatirbuddhakoṭyo loka utpannānyabhūvan sarve śākyamunisahanāmānastathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ ahaṃ ca tena kālena tena samayena ca rājā bhūddhārmiko dharmarājā,
S04n267:809: paṃcanavatirbuddhakoṭyaḥ śākyamunināmadheyāstathāgatāḥ gandhena mālyena vilepanenāstaraṇapravaraṇena cchatradhvajapatākābhiśca |
S04n267:810: tatraiva ca me vyākaraṇamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratilabdham ||
S04n267:811: [127] anusmarāmyahaṃ sarvaśūra navatirbuddhakoṭyaḥ krakatsudanāmānastathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā loka udapadyanta,
S04n267:812: ahaṃ ca tena kālena tena samayena brāhmakumāro'bhūva āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogaḥ pradānadātā sarvasvaparityāgī |
S04n267:813: te ca mayā tathāgatā sarve upasthitāḥ gandhena mālyena vilepanenāstarāṇaprāvaraṇena vibhūṣaṇācchādanena |
S04n267:814: yādṛśaṃ ca tathāgatānāmupasthānaṃ (tathā teṣāṃ mayā pratyarhamupasthānaṃ)
S04n267:815: kṛtaṃ tatraiva ca me vyākaraṇaṃ anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratilabdhaṃ na ca me kālaṃ na samayaṃ vyākaraṇāya ||
S04n267:817: sarve kanakamunināmānastathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ ahaṃ ca tena kālena tena samayena pradānaśūro bhūvan paryupāsitā me te tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ pujitāśca gandhena mālyena vilepanenāstaraṇaprāvaraṇena vibhūṣaṇena |
S04n267:818: yathā tathāgatānāṃ gurupasthānāṃ tathā me upasthitāḥ tatraiva ca me vyākaraṇamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratilabdhaṃ na ca me kālaṃ na samayaṃ vyākaraṇāyai |
S04n267:819: [129] anusmarāmyahaṃ sarvaśūra trayodaśa buddhakoṭyo loka udapadyanta;
S04n267:820: sarve vabhāsaśirnāmānastathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ te ca me tathāgatāḥ pūjitā āstaraṇaprāvaraṇena gandhena mālyena vilepanācchādanavibhūṣaṇena |
S04n267:821: yathā tathāgatānāṃ gurūpasthānaṃ kṛtaṃ tadṛśamupasthānamupasthitāḥ taiśca tathāgatairnānādharmamukhāni bhāṣitāni arthavinayaviniścayā tatraiva ca me vyākaraṇamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratilabdhaṃ na cādyāpi samayaṃ vyākaraṇāya |
S04n267:822: [130] anusmarāmyahaṃ sarvaśūra paṃcaviṃśatirbuddhakoṭyaḥ puṣyanāmānastathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā loka udapādyanta;
S04n267:823: ahaṃ ca tena kālena tena samayena prabrajito'bhūvam
S04n267:824: paryupāsitā me te tathāgatā yathā ānandaitarhi mamopasthāyakaupasthānamupatiṣṭhati |
S04n267:825: tādṛśaṃ ca me te tathāgatā upasthitāḥ tatraiva ca me vyākaraṇamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratilabdhaṃ na cādyāpi me samayamabhūdvyākaraṇāya |
S04n267:826: [131] anusmarāmyahaṃ sarvaśūra aṣṭādaśa buddhakoṭyo vipaśyināmānastathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā loka udapadyanta;
S04n267:827: paryupāsitā me te tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ ābharaṇaprāvaraṇenācchādanagandhamālyavilepanena yathā tathāgatopasthānaṃ tathā (me) upasthitā |
S04n267:828: ahaṃ ca tena kālena tena samayena prabrajito'bhūvan tatraiva ca (me)
S04n267:829: vyākaraṇamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratilabdhavān na cādyapi samayaṃ vyākaraṇāya na cireṇa kālena |
S04n267:830: [132] yaḥ paścimako vipaśyi loka utpannaḥ sa imaṃ saṃghāṭaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ bhāṣitavān tamahaṃ jñātvā tasmin samaye jaṃbudvīpe saptaratnavarṣaṃ pravṛṣṭavān tadā te jāṃbudvīpakāḥ sattvā adaridrā saṃvṛttāḥ tatraiva cāhaṃ vyākaraṇamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratilabdhavān tataścireṇa kālasamayenādyāpi (ca)
S04n267:832: [133] āha | katamaḥ sa bhagavān kālaḥ katamaḥ sa samayaḥ
S04n267:833: bhagavān āha - śṛṇu sarvaśūra tato dvyasaṃkhyeyaiḥ kalpairdīpaṃkaro nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi |
S04n267:834: tato'haṃ sarvaśura tena kālena tena samayena megho nāma aṇavako bhūvan yadā ca bhagavan dīpaṃkarastathāgato loka utpannaḥ tadāhamapi tasmin kāle tasmin samaye brahmacaryamacārṣaṃ māṇavakarūpeṇa
S04n267:835: tato'haṃ bhagavantan dīpaṃkaran tathāgataṃ dṛṣṭvā prasāda pratilabdhaḥ saptabhirutpalairavakīrṇavāṃ tacca tathāgatāvaropitaṃ kuśalamūlamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmitam
S04n267:836: sa ca mān dīpaṃkarastathāgato vyākārṣīdbhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇavakānāgate'dhvanyasaṃkhyeyaiḥ kalpaiḥ śākyamunirnāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iti |
S04n267:837: [134] tato'haṃ sarvaśūra dvādaśatālamātraṃ vihāyasamantarīkṣe sthitvānutpattikadharmakṣāntiṃ pratilabdhavān yacca me sarvaśūrāsaṃkhyeyeṣu kalpeṣu brahmacaryaṃ cīrṇaṃ |
S04n267:838: yacca pāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ tatsarvamāmukhībhūtamivānusmarāmi yathādya śvo vā |
S04n267:839: tatra mayā sarvaśūrānekāni sattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāni |
S04n267:840: kaḥ punarvāda sarvaśūra ya etarhyahama anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ sarvasattvahitaiṣiṇaḥ kāruṇikaḥ sattvānāṃ nirodhadharman deśayiṣyāmi |
S04n267:842: tatkasya hetoḥ bahuprakāraṃ cāhaṃ sarvaśūra sattvānān dharman deśayāmi |
S04n267:857: yena yena rūpeṇa sattvā vinayaṃ gacchanti tena tena rūpeṇāhaṃ sattvānān dharman deśayāmi |
S04n267:858: evaṃ bahuprakāram ahaṃ sarvaśūra sattvānān dharman deśayāmi |
S04n267:859: [136] tatkasya hetoryathaiva sarvaśūra sattvā bahuprakāraṃ dharmaṃ śṛṇvanti |
S04n267:860: tathaiva te sattvasārāḥ bahuprakāraṃ sattvānān dharman deśayanti |
S04n267:867: tenaiva ca dharmaśravaṇakuśalamūlahetunā tat pūrvakaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ saṃsmariṣyanti |
S04n267:868: teṣāṃ tad bhaviṣyati dīrgharātramarthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca |
S04n267:869: evaṃ hi sarvaśūra saṃghāṭasūtrasya dharmaparyāyasya sahaśravaṇamātreṇaivamaprameyā (-m-asaṃkhyeyā)
S04n267:871: [137] atha te sattvāḥ parasparamevamāhuḥ astyanyaḥ kaścit kuśalo dharmaphalavipākaḥ yasya kṛtatvādupacitatvādanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhyate sarvasattvāhitaiṣiṇaśca bhavanti ||
S04n267:872: [138] atha bhagavaṃsteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya tānetadavocat - asti kulaputrā ye dharmaṃ pattīyanti te evaṃ vakṣyanti asti dharmo yathābhūtaḥ teṣāṃ mahāphalaṃ sukhavipākamanuttaraṃ dharmasukhaṃ bhaviṣyati |
S04n267:874: na santi dharmāḥ na santi dharmānāṃ pāragaḥ sa teṣāṃ mahāphalaṃ kaṭukavipākamapāyeṣupapatsyate |
S04n267:878: dvādaśa kalpāni pretayoniṣu duḥkhaṃ vedanāṃ vedayiṣyanti |
S04n267:888: nirāsvādamasmābhirduḥkhamanubhūtaṃ nirāsvādamasmākāṃ putro'jātaḥ nirāsyādaṃ navā māsāḥ kukṣau dhāritaḥ śītoṣṇāṃ vedanāṃ vedayamānaiḥ kṣutpipāsāsuḥkhāṇi ca pratyanubhūtāni |
S04n267:889: bahūni ca dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyāni duḥkhāni dṛṣṭvā putro'jātaḥ na ca gṛhe mātāpitrāvutsukau kṛtau na svakāyaṃ |
S04n267:891: evameva sarvaśūra nirāśāḥ saddharmapratikṣepakāḥ sattvāḥ narakatiryakpretaparāyaṇāḥ te ca tasmin maraṇakālasamaye mahatā śokāśalyasamarpitā bhaviṣyanti |
S04n267:892: [142] ye sarvaśūra sattvā evaṃ vāgbhāṣante asti dharmaḥ asti dharmāṇāṃ pāragaḥ te tena kuśalamūlena viṃśāti kalpāṇyuttarakuruṣūpapatsyante |
S04n267:898: sukhāvatīnāmānaḥ sarvabuddhakṣetrasandarśanan dṛṣṭvā tatraiva pratiṣṭhānāṃ kṛtvā tatraiva bodhimabhisambhotsyante |
S04n267:899: [143] evaṃ hi sarvaśūra mahāprabhāvo yaṃ saṃghāṭo dharmaparyāyaḥ ye'smiṃścittaprasādaṃ kariṣyanti |
S04n267:900: na te jātu viṣamaparihāreṇa kālaṃ kariṣyanti |
S04n267:903: [144] santi sarvaśūra sattvā ya evaṃ vaksyanti rātrindivaṃ tathāgato bahūni sattvāni parimocayanti |
S04n267:908: atha kena hetunā sattvānāṃ kṣayo na bhavati ||
S04n267:910: [145] athānyatīrthikacarakaparibrājakanigranthānāmetadabhavat gamiṣyāmo vayaṃ śramaṇena gautamena sārdhaṃ vivādaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ atha khalu caturnavati brāhmaṇānyatīrthikacarakaparibrājakāḥ anekāni ca nigranthaśatāni yena rājagṛhaṃ mahānagaraṃ tenopasaṃkrāmanti |
S04n267:911: tena ca kālena tena samayena bhagavān smitāṃ prāduṣcakāra; ||
S04n267:912: [146] atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāṃjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat - ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ smitasya prāduṣkaraṇāya |
S04n267:913: nāhetuṃ nāpratyayaṃ tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā smitaṃ prāduṣkurvanti |
S04n267:914: [147] bhagavānāha - śṛṇu kulaputrādyeha rājagṛhe mahānagare mahāsannipāto bhaviṣyati |
S04n267:916: devā vā nāgā vā yakṣā vā manuṣyā vā amanuṣyā vā |
S04n267:922: sarve ca te brāhmaṇā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau cittamutpādayiṣyanti |
S04n267:933: te sarve mamāntikāddharmaṃ śrutvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpādayiṣyanti ||
S04n267:934: [151] atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantaṃ (tṛṣ)
S04n267:937: [152] atha khalu sarvaśūro bodhisattvo mahāsattva utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāṃjaliṃ praṇāmya bhagavantametadavocat - kinnāmo bhagavan paṃcamātrāṇi rājaśatāni |
S04n267:938: [153] bhagavān āha - śṛṇu sarvaśūra nado nāma rājā sunando nāma rājā |
S04n267:950: ekaiko rāja viṃśatikoṭīsahasraparivāraḥ te sarve'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ sthāpayitvā rājā virūḍhakaḥ
S04n267:954: uttarasyān diśi aśīti koṭīsahasrāṇi bodhisattvānām āgacchanti |
S04n267:958: [155] atha te sarve bodhisattvā yena rājagṛhaṃ mahānagaraṃ yena ca gṛddhrakūṭaparvato yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntā bhagavato darśanāya (;vandanāya) |
S04n267:959: sarve ca te bodhisattvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ saṃprasthitāḥ
S04n267:960: [156] atha khalu bhagavān sarvaśūraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamāmantrayati (sma;)
S04n267:961: gaccha tvaṃ sarvaśūra daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu bodhisattvānāṃ evaṃ vada |
S04n267:962: adya tathāgato rājagṛhe mahānagare dharman deśayati |
S04n267:963: tadyūyaṃ sarve daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu sthitā añjalīn praṇāmayatha;
S04n267:964: anuśrāvya ca muhūrtamātreṇa ca punarevāgaccha dharmaśravaṇāya |
S04n267:965: [157] atha khalu sarvaśūro bodhisattvo mahāsattva utthāyāsanād bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantaṃ (tṛṣ)
S04n267:967: [158] atha khalu sarvaśūro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu gatvā bodhisattvānāmārocayati |
S04n267:968: adya mārṣā śākyamunistathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sahāyāṃ lokadhātau rājagṛhe mahānagare sattvānān dharmaṃ deśayati |
S04n267:971: [159] atha khalu sarvaśūro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu gatvā sarvabuddhān paryupāsya bodhisattvānāmārocayati |
S04n267:972: tadyathāpi nāma balavān puruṣo cchaṭāsaṃghāṭaṃ kuryādatrāntare sarvaśūro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yena rājagṛhaṃ mahānagaraṃ yena ca bhagavāṃstenāgatya bhagavataḥ purata sthitaḥ tatra ca sarve brāhmaṇānyatīrthikacarakaparibrājakanigranthā sannipatitāḥ bahavaśca devanāgamanuṣyāmanuṣyāḥ paṃcamātrāṇi ca rājaśatāni saparivārāṇi sannipatitāni |
S04n267:974: [160] atha khalu punaḥ tena samayena rājagṛhaṃ mahānagaraṃ prakaṃpitam atha khalu daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣi divyaṃ candanacūrṇaṃ pravarṣitaṃ |
S04n267:976: tad bhagavato mūrdhasandhau kūṭāgāraḥ saṃsthitaḥ tena khalu punaḥ samayena tathāgatasya purataḥ śakro devānāmindro vajraṃ parāhanat
S04n267:977: [161] atha khalu tasmin samaye caturdiśaṃ catvāro vātarājanaḥ saṃkṣubdhāḥ pravānti |
S04n267:978: yena ca rājagṛhe mahānagare saṃkarā vā paṃsavo vā bālikā vā tatsarvaṃ nagarādbahiḥ prakṣipanti |
S04n267:981: te ca puṣpāsteṣāṃ sattvānāmuparimurdhni puṣpacchatrāṇi tasthire |
S04n267:982: tathāgatasya coparimurdhni uparyantarīkṣe caturaśītiḥ kūṭāgārasahasrāṇi saṃsthitāni |
S04n267:983: teṣu ca caturaśītiṣu puṣpakūṭāgārasahasreṣu caturaśīti sahasrāṇyāsanānāṃ prajñaptāni saptaratnamayāni prādurbhūtāni |
S04n267:984: sarvatra cāsane tathāgato niṣaṇṇo dharman deśayati |
S04n267:985: atha khalvayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ ṣaḍvikāraṃ prakampitaḥ ||
S04n267:986: [162] atha khalu sarvaśūro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yena bhagavāṃstenāṃjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat - ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo yadimānyevaṃrūpāṇi rājagṛhe mahānagare prātihāryāṇi;
S04n267:988: bhagavān āha - tadyathā kaścideva puruṣaḥ syāccañcalaścapalo'haṃkāramamakārasthitaḥ sa ca daridro bhavet tasya rājā śīrṣaṃ parimārjayedatha sa puruṣo'dhimānādyāvādrājadvāraṃ gatvā balasā taṃ rājakulaṃ praveṣṭuṃ icchedatha te rājāmātyapārṣadyāstaṃ puruṣaṃ gṛhṇīyurbahubhiśca prakāraistāḍayeyur
S04n267:989: [163] atha tena kālena tena samayena sa rājā śṛṇuyād etaṃ prakṛtiṃ sa daridrapuruṣo balasābhyantaraṃ praveṣṭukāma iti |
S04n267:990: śrutvā cāsyaivaṃ bhaved avaśyamayaṃ mama ghātayitukāmaḥ
S04n267:991: tataḥ sa rājā ruṣṭastān pārṣadyānevaṃ vaded gacchantu bhavanta etaṃ puruṣaṃ parvatavivaraṃ nītvā jīvitādvyaparopayatha;
S04n267:995: [164] evameva sarvaśūra tathāgato'pyarhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sattvānān dharman deśayati |
S04n267:996: tatra yathā sa puruṣo'dhimānika evaṃ bālapṛthagjanāstathāgataṃ rūpavarṇaliṃgasaṃsthānato nimittamudgṛhya tathāgatakāyamiti saṃjānanti |
S04n267:997: [165] tatra te bahūn dharmaṃcchrutvādhimāne patanti nānāpralāpān pralapanti |
S04n267:999: svayameva dharmaṃ na śṛṇvanti na prakāśayanti |
S04n267:1000: yaḥ kaścit sūtraṃ vā gāthāṃ vāntaśo dṛṣṭāntaṃ vā teṣāṃ ārocayati |
S04n267:1005: na te tathārūpaṃ dharmopasaṃhitaṃ vacanaṃ śroṣyanti |
S04n267:1014: bahavastvayā vayaṃ śilpajñānaṃ śikṣāpitāḥ kathaṃ tvaṃ svamātmānaṃ na śaknuṣe parisaṃsthāpayituṃ |
S04n267:1015: sa teṣāṃ evaṃ vadenna śakyaṃ mārṣā idānīmātmānaṃ parisaṃsthāpayituṃ |
S04n267:1018: yathā tasyaikapudgalasyarthena bahavo jñatṛsaṃghā jīvitādvyavaropitā anaparādhinaḥ svakarmapratyayena |
S04n267:1019: evameva te sattvā maraṇakālasamaye teṣāṃ paridevatāṃ narakatiryagyoniparāyaṇaṃ ātmānaṃ samanupaśyantaḥ akalyāṇamitrahetoḥ evameva yuṣmākaṃ brāhmaṇānāmanyatīrthikacarakaparibrājakanigranthānāmevaṃ vadāmi |
S04n267:1020: mā yūyaṃ pramattā bhavathaḥ tadyathāpināmājātapakṣaḥ śakunirna śaknotyākāśe prakramituṃ devalokagamanāya |
S04n267:1022: na śakyaṃ nirvāṇaṃ anuprāptuṃ na yuṣmākaṃ tathā ṛddhiḥ saṃvidyate |
S04n267:1023: tatkasya hetoḥ karmaprakaraṇena yūyaṃ kukkuṭayonyā ivotpannāḥ na cireṇāyaṃ kāyo bhedanadharmā maraṇaparyavasāno bhaviṣyati |
S04n267:1025: [169] kimayaṃ asmābhirātmabhāvaḥ sandhārito ye vayaṃ na devasukhaṃ na manuṣyalokasukhaṃ pratyanubhaviṣyāma |
S04n267:1035: pṛcchatha yūyaṃ mārṣāstathāgataṃ yadyadevākāṃkṣathāhaṃ yuṣmākaṃ sarvābhiprāyān paripūrayiṣyāmi |
S04n267:1036: [171] atha khalu te sarve brāhmaṇānyatīrthikacarakaparibrājakanigranthā utthāyāsanebhyaḥ ekāṃsāni cīvarāṇi pravṛtyāṃjalayaḥ pragṛhya bhagavantaṃ paripṛcchanti (sma) |
S04n267:1037: bahūni bhagavaṃ sattvāni rātrindivastathāgataḥ saṃsārā parimocayati |
S04n267:1038: na ca sattvadhātorūnatvaṃ vā pūrṇatvaṃ vā prajñāyate |
S04n267:1039: ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ yatte sattvā samānā utpādanirodhaṃ darśayanti || 0 ||
S04n267:1043: [172] tatra khalu bhagavān bhaiṣajyasenaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamāmantrayati sma |
S04n267:1048: (śṛṇutha yūyaṃ kulaputrā ihānantāparyanta pṛthivīdhāturabdhātustejodhāturvāyudhāturato nāṃtataraḥ sattvadhātuḥ santi ca sattvāḥ ye sattvahitārthamutpādanirodhaṃ darśayaṃti)
S04n267:1049: paścime tu kāle bhaviṣyanti daharā sattvā vṛddhā vā ye utpādanirodhaṃ kariṣyanti |
S04n267:1050: santi bhaiṣajyasena vṛddhā sattvā daharā iva na kiṃcijjānanti |
S04n267:1051: [173] tadyathāpi nāma bhaiṣajyasena kaścideva puruṣaḥ śiraṃ śocayeta navakāni ca vastrāṇi pravṛṇuyāt sa ca gṛhādbahirniṣkrameta |
S04n267:1054: atha kaścidevāparaḥ sattvo bhavet sa śiraḥ śocayeta purāṇakāni ca vastrāṇi (śocayitvā)
S04n267:1055: prāvṛṇuyāt tāni ca śithilakāni bhavanti na ca śobhante |
S04n267:1056: sa ca puruṣaḥ susnātaśirā bhavati vastraṃ cāsya na śobhate |
S04n267:1057: evameva bhaiṣajyasena saṃti vṛddhā sattvā ye jaṃbūdvīpaṃ na śobhayanti |
S04n267:1059: [174] atha khalu te sarve'nyatīrthikacarakaparibrājakanigranthabrāhmaṇā utthāyasanād bhagavantametadavocan - ko bhagavannasmākaṃ vṛddho vā daharo vā
S04n267:1060: bhagavān āha - vṛddhā yūyaṃ punaḥ punarnarakatiryakpreteṣu duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ dṛṣṭvā tadadyāpi yūyaṃ tṛptiṃ nādhigacchatha;
S04n267:1061: [175] atha khalu te sarve brāhmaṇānyatīrthikacarakaparibrājakanigranthāḥ sarve ca nāgarājāno bhagavantametadavocan - na bhūyo bhagavannutsahāma saṃsāre duḥkhāṃ vedanāmanubhavituṃ
S04n267:1062: te cānyatīrthikacarakaparibrājakanigranthabrāhmaṇā evamāhuḥ na santi daharā sattvā ye śaknuyurdharmatāṃ sākṣāt kartum ||
S04n267:1063: [176] atha khalu bhaiṣajyaseno bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - paśya bhadanta bhagavan kiyadduradhimocyā ime sattvāḥ
S04n267:1064: bhagavān āha - śṛṇu bhaiṣajyasena saṃprataṃ tathāgataḥ sarvalokapratyakṣaṃ karoti |
S04n267:1065: [177] atha khalu catunavati koṭīsahasrāṇi navakānāṃ sattvānāṃ te tathāgatasya purataḥ sthitāḥ na ca tathāgataṃ bandanti nālapanti na saṃlapanti |
S04n267:1067: atha khalu bhaiṣajyaseno bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo yadete sattvā bhagavantaṃ nālapanti na saṃlapanti na vandanti na ca bhagavantaṃ paripṛcchanti |
S04n267:1068: bhagavān āha - śṛṇu bhaiṣajyasena ye sattvā evaṃ vadanti na śakyaṃ navakaiḥ sattvairdharmatā sākṣāt kartum ||
S04n267:1069: ta ete bhaiṣajyasena navakāḥ sattvā yuṣmābhirdraṣṭavyāḥ
S04n267:1070: te ca sattvā evaṃ āhurvayaṃ bhadanta bhagavan navakāḥ sattvā vayaṃ bhadanta sugata navakāḥ sattvā |
S04n267:1071: bhagavān āha - eṣāṃ bho sattvānāṃ lokapratyakṣaṃ sāṃprataṃ svaśarīrāllokasya pramānaṃ darśayatha |
S04n267:1072: [178] tena khalu punaḥ kālena tena samayena caturnavati koṭīsahasrāṇi navakānāṃ sattvānāṃ kāyasya bhedādantarikṣe sthitvā daśabhūmipratilabdhā abhūvan
S04n267:1073: atha khalu bhaiṣajyaseno bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - sulabdhā lābhā bhagavannīdṛśāḥ sattvāḥ ye saṃsāre parikṣayāya paryadānāya vīryamārabhante |
S04n267:1074: adyaiva bhagavannime sattvā utpannāḥ adyaiva bhagavannime sattvāḥ parimuktāḥ (adyaiva)
S04n267:1076: [179] atha khalu sarvabrāhmaṇānyatīrthikacarakaparibrājakanigranthā nāgarājāno'pi mārāśca pāpīyānaṃ saparivāraṃ upasaṃkrāntaṃ vicakṣuṣkaraṇāya;
S04n267:1077: sarve ca te bhagavantametadavocanniha vayaṃ bhagavan tathāgatasyāntikamupasaṃkrāntā vicakṣuṣkaraṇāya |
S04n267:1078: te vayaṃ bhagavanniman dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā prasādapratilabdhā abhūvan buddhe ca dharme ca |
S04n267:1079: tatrāsmākaṃ bhagavan sarveṣāṃ evaṃ bhagavatyevaṃrūpaṃ buddhasukhaṃ pratilabhema; ||
S04n267:1080: evaṃrūpāśca tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā loke bhavema;
S04n267:1081: [180] bhagavān āhaivametadbhadramukhā evametadyathā yūyaṃ tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntikamupasaṃkrāntāḥ tairyuṣmābhirimaṃ saṃghāṭaṃ (sūtraṃ)
S04n267:1083: tena yūyaṃ bhadramukhāḥ kuśalamūlena na cireṇa kālenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyadhve |
S04n267:1085: [181] atha tāvadeva teṣāṃ sarveṣāmanyatīrthikacarakaparibrājakanigranthabrāhmaṇānāmanutpattikadharmakṣāntipraitlabdho'bhūvat sarve ca daśabhūmipratiṣṭhitā bodhisattvāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ sarve ca te bodhisattvā uparyantarīkṣe sapta tālān vaihāyasamabhyudgamya saptaratnamayāni kūṭāgārāṇi tathāgatasyopanāmayanti |
S04n267:1087: atha tāvadeva te sarve bhagavata uparimūrdhni sthitvā bhagavantaṃ nānāpuṣpairabhyavakiranti |
S04n267:1092: mahālābhaḥ śramaṇo gautamaḥ mahākṣetraṃ lokanāthaḥ samādhibalādhānaprāptaḥ vijño vijñārthikaḥ yaḥ īdṛśān sattvān saṃsārādanupūrveṇopāyakauśalyena parimocayatyekena subhāṣitamātreṇa etāvanti sattvāni saṃsārāt parimucyante ||
S04n267:1093: [183] atha khalu bhaiṣajyaseno bodhisattvo mahāsattva utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāṃjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat - ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo ya eta devaputrā evaṃ vānniścārayanti |
S04n267:1096: bhagavān āha - śṛṇu kulaputra na hi te māṃ stunvanti |
S04n267:1101: sarvabuddhaparigṛhītāśca bhaviṣyantyanuttarāsyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherabhisaṃbodhāyābhisaṃbudhya ca dharman deśayiṣyanti (ca) ||
S04n267:1102: [184] atha khalu bhaiṣajyaseno bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - bahavo bhadanta bhagavan sattvāḥ bahavo bhadanta sugataḥ sattvā rātrindivaṃ parimucyante tadadyāpi sattvānāṃ kṣayo na bhavati |
S04n267:1103: bhagavān āha - sādhu sādhu bhaiṣajyasena yastvaṃ tathāgatametamarthaṃ paripraṣṭavyaṃ manyase |
S04n267:1104: śṛṇu bhaiṣajyasena tadyathāpi nāma bhaiṣajyasena kaścideva puruṣo bhavedāḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogaḥ prabhūtabhogaḥ bahudhanadhānyakośakoṣṭhāgārasamanvāgataḥ bahudāsadāsīkarmakarapauruṣeyāni cāsya syuḥ bahūni ca dhanaskandhāni bhaveyuḥ bahūni ca kṣetrārāmāṇi saṃvidyeran bahūni ca dhanadhānyāni |
S04n267:1105: tadyathā yavagodhumaśālitilamāṣamudgādīni sa ca puruṣo vasantakāle sarvāni tāni dhanadhānyāni vāpayeta |
S04n267:1106: atha yāvadapareṇa kālasamayena sarvāṇi tāni dhanadhānyāni paripadyaran sa paripakvānīti viditvā sa yāvadabhyantaragṛhe praveśayeta;
S04n267:1107: sa puruṣastāni dhanadhānyāni gṛhasyābhyantare pṛthak pṛthak sthāpayati |
S04n267:1111: [185] evameva bhaiṣajyasena ime sattvāḥ pūrvaṃ śubhaṃ karma kṛtvā paścāt teṣāṃ karmaṇāṃ parikṣayāt punaḥ punarapi puṇyakṣetrameṣante kuśalamūlānyavaropayanti |
S04n267:1112: kuśalamūlānyavaropayitvā tatra ca kuśaladharme pratipatya saṃpādayanti |
S04n267:1115: tena ca prītiprāmodyacittena bhaiṣajyasenānekāni kalpakoṭīsahasrāṇi na nāśyante |
S04n267:1116: evameva bhaiṣajyasena prathamacittotpādiko bodhisattvo na kadācid vināśadharmā bhavati |
S04n267:1118: [186] āha | kathaṃ bhagavan prathamacittotpādiko bodhisattvaḥ svapnaṃ paśyati |
S04n267:1120: bahūni bhaiṣajyasena prathamacittotpādiko bodhisattvaḥ svapnāntare bhayāni paśyati |
S04n267:1123: na śakyaṃ bhaiṣajyasena pāpakarmaṇā sattvena tīvraṃ duḥkhamapanayituṃ na ca pāpena svapnena dṛṣṭenāsya bhayaṃ bhavati |
S04n267:1124: [187] bhaiṣajyasena āha - katamāni bhagavan prathamacittotpādiko bodhisattvaḥ svapnāntare bhayāni paśyati |
S04n267:1125: bhagavān āha - agniṃ bhaiṣajyasena prajvalitaṃ paśyati |
S04n267:1126: tatra tena bodhisattvenaivaṃ cittaṃ utpādayitavyaṃ sarvakleśāni me dagdhāḥ dvitīyaṃ bhaiṣajyasena udakaṃ paśyati luḍitaṃ saṃpraluḍitaṃ |
S04n267:1127: tatra tena prathamacittotpādikena bodhisattvena na bhettavyaṃ |
S04n267:1128: tatkasya hetoḥ evaṃ hi bhaiṣajyasena bodhisattvena sarvamohabandhanāni vinivartya sarvapāpakṣayaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati |
S04n267:1129: tṛtīyaṃ bhaiṣajyasena prathamacittotpādiko bodhisattvaḥ svapnaṃ paśyati mahābhayaṃ |
S04n267:1131: [188] bhagavān āha - svaśarīre śīrṣaṃ muṇḍitaṃ paśyati |
S04n267:1132: tatra tena bhaiṣajyasena prathamacittotpādikena bodhisattvena na bhettavyaṃ tatkasya hetoḥ tenaivaṃ cittamutpādayitavyaṃ rāgadveṣamohāni me muṇḍitāni bhavanti |
S04n267:1133: ṣaḍgatikaṃ ca me saṃsāraṃ parājitaṃ bhaviṣyati |
S04n267:1137: na nāgeṣu na deveṣu pariśuddheṣu bhaiṣajyasena buddhakṣetreṣu prathamacittotpādiko bodhisattvaḥ upapattiṃ pratigṛhṇāti |
S04n267:1139: bhaiṣajyasena paścime kāle paścime samaye yadi kaścit sattvo bodhau cittaṃ pariṇamayiṣyati |
S04n267:1142: tatra(tena) bhaiṣajyasena prathamacittotpādikena bodhisattvena na parikhedacittamutpādayitavyaṃ na vyavasitavyaṃ |
S04n267:1143: [190] bahavo bhaiṣajyasena mayā dharmā deśitāḥ mayā ca bhaiṣajyasenānekāni kalpaniyutaśatasahasrāni duṣkaracaryā cīrṇā na mayā bhaiṣajyasena rājyabhogārthāya vā vṛttibhogārthāya vā aiśvaryabhogārthāya vā duṣkaracaryā cīrṇāḥ svabhāvadharmāvabodhāya bhaiṣajyasena mayā duṣkaracaryā cīrṇāḥ na ca me tāvadanuttarā samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhā yāvanna mayāyaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ śrutaḥ yasminstu bhaiṣajyasena kālasamaye mayāyaṃ saṃghāṭo dharmaparyāya śrutaḥ tatraiva me divase anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhā gaṃbhīro yaṃ bhaiṣajyasena dharmaparyāyaḥ durlabho'sya bhaiṣajyasena dharmaparyāyasya kalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrairapi śravaḥ paramadurlabho bhaiṣajyasena tathāgatānāmutpādaḥ paramadurlabhā bhaiṣajyasenāsya dharmaparyāyasya dhārakaḥ
S04n267:1146: kalpaśatasahasraṃ bhaiṣajyasena sattvā saṃsārāt paścānmukhaṃ kariṣyanti |
S04n267:1151: bhavyā abhijñākuśalasthānaṃ prajñatum bhavyāḥ kuśalasthānanirodhaṃ prajñātum
S04n267:1159: bhagavān āha - sādhu sādhu bhaiṣajyasena yas(tvaṃ)
S04n267:1161: [193] āha | kena kāreṇana bhagavan tathāgatā loka utpadyante |

S04n267:1175: tasya gacchatastau mātāpitarāvevamāhutuḥ śṛṇu kulaputra idaṃ suvarṇasya puruṣabhārasahasraṃ gṛhītaṃ parakyasvakasya ca;

S04n267:1377: te na jalpanti nālapanti na saṃlapanti na bhāṣanti |
S04n267:1380: adhastāddiśyeko vṛkṣo prādurbhūtaḥ saptayojanasahasrapramāṇaḥ tatra ca paṃcaviṃśati koṭīsahasrāṇi janakāyasya sannipatitāni |
S04n267:1381: te na jalpanti nālapanti na saṃlapanti na bhāṣanti nottiṣṭhānti |
S04n267:1384: [218] atha khalu bhaiṣajyaseno bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - pṛccheyamahaṃ bhagavantaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ kaṃcideva pradeśaṃ sacenme bhagavān avakāśaṃ kuryāt pṛṣṭaḥ praśnavyākaraṇāya |
S04n267:1385: evamukte bhagavān bhaiṣajyasenaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - pṛccha tvaṃ bhaiṣajyasena yadyadevākāṃkṣasyahan te tasya tasyaiva praśnasya paripṛṣṭasya vyākaraṇena cittamārādhayiṣye |
S04n267:1386: [219] evamukte bhaiṣajyaseno bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - kimetad bhagavaṃścaturdiśe lokadhātuṣu janakāyamāgatyāvasthito yāvadadhastā ūrdhvāyāṃ diśi paṃcāśat koṭyo janakāyamāgatyāvasthitaḥ te ca bhagavantaṃ nālapanti na saṃlapanti |
S04n267:1387: na jalpanti na vadanti na bhāṣanti |
S04n267:1390: ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ bhagavān āha - gaccha tvaṃ bhaiṣajyasena svayameva tāṃstathāgatān paripṛcchā;
S04n267:1394: bhagavān āha - svakena bhaiṣajyasena ṛddhibalādhānena gaccha |
S04n267:1396: [220] atha khalu bhaiṣajyaseno bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantaṃ tṛguptaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya tatraivāntardhitaḥ
S04n267:1397: atha khalvito lokadhātā ṣaṇnavati lokadhātukoṭīratikramya candrapradīpā nāma lokadhātuḥ tatra candrāvatikṣetro nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha etarhi tiṣṭhati dhṛyate yāpayati |
S04n267:1398: aśītikoṭī bodhisattvamahāsattvasahasraparivṛtaḥ puraskṛto dharman deśayati sma |
S04n267:1400: [221] atha khalu bhaiṣajyaseno bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrānta upasaṃkramya tasya bhagavataścandrāvatikṣetrasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasābhivandya purata sthitaḥ sthitvā yena sa bhagavāṃstenāṃjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat - āgato'smi bhagavan ṣaṇnavati lokadhātukoṭīsahasrāṇyatikramya bhagavataḥ śākyamunestathāgatasya buddhakṣetrāt sahāyā lokadhātoḥ na cāhaṃ bhagavaṃstāvanti sattvāni kvacit paśyāmi |
S04n267:1402: ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo yat sahāyāṃ lokadhātau bhagavataḥ śākyamunestathāgatasya purato bahujanakāyaḥ sannipatito daśadigabhyāgatastatrasthaḥ paśyāmyāsīttāni cehastho na paśyāmi |
S04n267:1403: [222] sa bhagavān āha - tatraiva bhaiṣajyasena saṃcaranti saṃtiṣṭhanti |
S04n267:1407: āha | kena bhagavan dṛṣṭaṃ kena śrutaṃ yad acetane vṛkṣe manuṣyā jāyante |
S04n267:1408: sa bhagavān āha - na bhaiṣajyasena tvayā dṛṣṭaṃ (vā)
S04n267:1411: āha | na me bhagavan dṛṣṭaṃ na śrutaṃ yadacetane vṛkṣe manuṣyā jāyante |
S04n267:1412: sa bhagavān āha - icchasi tvaṃ bhaiṣajyasena draṣṭuṃ tadahaṃ sāṃprataṃ darśayiṣyāmi |
S04n267:1414: [223] atha khalu bhagavāṃścandrāvatikṣetrastathāgatastasyāṃ velāyāṃ śatapuṇyavicitritaṃ svaṃ bāhuṃ prasārayati sma |
S04n267:1415: tataśca bāhutaḥ koṭīśatasahasraṃ janakāyānāṃ prādurabhavatekaikaśca janakāyo bāhuśataṃ prasārya nānāgandhavilepanaistathāgatamabhyavakiranti |
S04n267:1416: atha sa bhagavāṃścandrāvatikṣetrastathāgato bhaiṣajyasenaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamāmantrayati |
S04n267:1417: paśyasi tvaṃ bhaiṣajyasena eṣa janakāyastathāgataṃ nānāgandhamālyavilepanairabhyavakiranti |
S04n267:1419: sa bhagavān āha - ete acetanā janakāyāḥ prādurbhūtāḥ eta acetanā manuṣyāḥ pratyājātāḥ ||
S04n267:1420: atha khalu teṣāṃ koṭīśatasahasrāṇāmekaikasya yadbāhuśataṃ te sarve vikīryante |
S04n267:1421: [224] atha khalu bhaiṣajyaseno bodhisattvo mahāsattvastaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhagavantametadavocat - kimidaṃ bhagavan kimidaṃ sugataḥ yan manuṣyāṇāṃ muhūrtamātreṇa bāhuśataṃ vikīrṇam yadi bhagavaṃcchatabāhavo na mucyante kaḥ punarvādo dvibāhukā manuṣyā mokṣyante |
S04n267:1422: bhagavān āha - evameva bhaiṣajyasenācetanāḥ sattvā jāyante |
S04n267:1425: āha | katame bhagavan sattvā ye daharāḥ katame vṛddhāḥ
S04n267:1426: bhagavān āha - santi bhaiṣajyasena daharāḥ sattvā santi vṛddhāḥ
S04n267:1427: āha | katame bhagavan daharā katame vṛddhāḥ
S04n267:1428: āha | ye te sāmprataṃvikīrṇā te vṛddhāḥ ye te vṛkṣebhyo nirjātāste daharā |
S04n267:1429: āha | icchāmi bhagavan daharāṇi sattvāni draṣṭum
S04n267:1430: [225] atha khalu sa bhagavāṃścandrāvatikṣetrastathāgato dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇitalaṃ prasārayati |
S04n267:1431: atha daśabhyo digbhyaḥ koṭīśatasahasraṃ janakāyānāṃ āgacchanti |
S04n267:1433: āgatvā ca te janakāyā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya na ca tathāgatamālapanti na saṃlapanti tūṣṇīṃbhāvenādhivāsayanti sma |
S04n267:1434: [226] atha khalu bhaiṣajyaseno bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - kimete bhagavan sattvāstathāgataṃ nālapanti na saṃlapanti tūṣṇīṃbhāvenādhivāsayanti |
S04n267:1435: bhagavān āha - na jānāsi bhaiṣajyasena acetanaḥ pṛthivīpradeśo nālapanti na saṃlapanti |
S04n267:1437: tatkasya hetoḥ ihaikatyā bhaiṣajyasena daharā sattvāḥ notpādaṃ jānanti na nirodhaṃ jānanti |
S04n267:1438: dṛṣṭvā ca na jarā na vyādhirna śoko na paridevaḥ na priyaviprayogo nāpriyasaṃprayogaḥ na priyādvinābhāvaḥ na maraṇaṃ nākālamṛtyu |
S04n267:1439: nāpi tāni sarvakaṭukāni duḥkhāṇi dṛṣṭvā udyogamāpadyante kutaste jñāsyanti |
S04n267:1441: [227] atha khalu bhaiṣajyaseno bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - kuto bhagavan daharā sattvā āgacchanti |
S04n267:1445: bhagavān āha - śṛṇu bhaiṣajyasena yan mānuṣyakamātmabhāvaṃ pratigṛhṇanti |
S04n267:1452: punaḥ punaśca teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ śilpāni śikṣāpayanti |
S04n267:1453: anantaṃ ca teṣāṃ kaṭukaṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃbhavati |
S04n267:1454: kaṭukā vedanāḥ tatra teṣāṃ pūrvakṛtānāṃ pāpakānāṃ karmaṇāṃ vipākamanubhavanti |
S04n267:1455: ihaiva te bhaiṣajyasena daharāḥ sattvā āgatā ya ete (nālapanti na saṃlapanti)
S04n267:1457: anena kāraṇena bhaiṣajyasena nālapanti na saṃlapanti |
S04n267:1458: evaṃ te bhaiṣajyasena daharāḥ sattvāḥ kuśalamajānānāḥ notpādaṃ jānanti na nirodhaṃ jānanti |
S04n267:1461: [228] āha | kathaṃ bhagavan daharāḥ sattvā utpadyante kathaṃ nirudhyante |
S04n267:1462: bhagavān āha - tadyathāpi nāma bhaiṣajyasena kaścideva puruṣa agniṃ kāṣṭhena parimārjayetta tasyānupūrveṇa taṃ kāṣṭhamagninā pradīpyeta |
S04n267:1465: āha | ko trābhijāto jātaḥ kaḥ parinirvṛtaḥ
S04n267:1466: bhagavān āha - buddha eva bhaiṣajyasenābhijāto jātaḥ tathāgata eva parinirvṛtaḥ
S04n267:1467: [229] tadyathāpi nāma bhaiṣajyasena kasmiṃcidandhakāragṛhe timirāgāre rājñā puruṣo bandhanāvarodhaḥ kṛtaḥ syāt tatra sa puruṣo'ndhakāragṛhe praviṣṭaḥ antargṛhe timiraṃ timirāgāraṃ paśyet athānyaḥ ka kaścit puruṣaḥ pūrvaduḥkhavedanābhirdṛṣṭaścintayennaṣṭa eṣa puruṣaḥ anabhyasitaḥ duḥkho jīvite vināśaṃ yāsyati |
S04n267:1469: sa ca puruṣaścārakāvaruddhastamagniraśmiṃ paśyeddṛṣṭvā cāśvasto bhaved utsāhaṃ ca vardhayet sa cāgniḥ kenacideva hetunā prajvaleta;
S04n267:1470: tena cāgninjvālena tadgṛhaṃ samantataḥ prajvalet sa ca puruṣastatraiva dahyet taṃ ca dagdhaṃ rājā śrutvā cintāyāsamāpadyeta |
S04n267:1471: tasyaivaṃ bhavenna bhūyo'haṃ svaviṣaye kaṃcit sattvaṃ cārakāvarodhaṃ kariṣyāmi |
S04n267:1472: atha sa rājā teṣāṃ svaviṣayanivāsināṃ sattvānāmevaṃ samāśvāsayet mā yūyaṃ bhavantaḥ sattvā bhāyatha mā utrasatha;
S04n267:1473: abhayaṃ yuṣmākaṃ bhavatuḥ na mama viṣaye bhūyo daṇḍopacāraṃ (vā)
S04n267:1475: na ca kasyacit sattvasya jīvitavināśaṃ kariṣyāmi |
S04n267:1477: [230] evameva bhaiṣajyasena tathāgataḥ sarvakleśadagdhaḥ sarvavyādhipraśāntaḥ yathā sa puruṣo gṛhadāhāt svakāyaṃ dahati |
S04n267:1480: sattvān vadhabandhanāvarodheṣu parimocayedevameva tathāgato rāgadveṣamohamalaprahīṇaḥ sarvasattvānān dīpa iva loka utpannaḥ sattvān mocayati narakatiryakpretāsurakāyebhyaḥ daharāṃśca (sattvāṃ)
S04n267:1484: vuptāni yatra bījāni na vināśaṃ brajanti hi |
S04n267:1488: śāntaṃ kṛtvā sarvalokaṃ buddhaḥ śodheti dakṣiṇāṃ |
S04n267:1489: (79) moceti navakān sattvān moceti ca purāṇakān
S04n267:1492: śāntiḥ kṛtā hi lokesmin paraloke sukhaṃ kṛtaṃ ||

S04n267:1494: (81) sādhu darśanu sādhūnāṃ buddhānām sādhu darśanaṃ |
S04n267:1497: ye śroṣyanti idaṃ sūtraṃ padaṃ prāpsyantyanuttaraṃ
S04n267:1498: [233] atha khalu bhaiṣajyaseno bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yena bhagavāṃstenāṃjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantametadavocat - ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ smitasya prāduṣkaraṇāya |
S04n267:1499: bhagavān āha - paśyasi tvaṃ kulaputraitāni daharāṇi sattvāni |
S04n267:1501: bhagavān āha - sarva ete bhaiṣajyasenādyaiva daśabhūmipratiṣṭhitā bodhisattvā bhaviṣyanti ||
S04n267:1502: [234] atha khalu bhaiṣajyaseno bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'śītiryojanasahasrāṇyūrdhavamuparyantarīkṣe sthādathāśītirdevaputrakoṭīsahasrāṇi bhagavata upari puṣpavarṣaṃ pravarṣanti te ca daharāḥ sattvā dṛṣṭvā sarve'ñjalayaḥ kṛtvā namaskurvanti |
S04n267:1503: [235] atha khalu bhaiṣajyaseno bodhisattvo mahāsattvo antarīkṣastha evaṃ vāg bhāṣate |
S04n267:1507: trisāhasramahāsāhasraśca lokadhātuḥ ṣaḍvikāraṃ prakampitaḥ caturaśītiśca nāgarājasahasrāṇi mahāsamudre saṃkṣubdāni |
S04n267:1509: paṃcaviṃśat koṭīsahasrāṇi pretānāṃ yakṣānāṃ rākṣasānāmaḍakavatyāṃ rājadhānyāmāgatāni bhagavataḥ purato mahāsannipātaḥ saṃsthitaḥ ||
S04n267:1510: [236] atha khalu bhagavāṃsteṣān daharāṇāṃ sattvānān dharman deśayati |
S04n267:1511: daśasu dikṣu lokadhātukoṭīniyutaśatasahasreṣu bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ svakasvakābhyo ṛddhibhirāgatāni |
S04n267:1512: atha khalu bhaiṣajyaseno bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yena bhagavāṃstenāṃjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantametadavocat - bahavo bhagavan bahavo sugata bodhisattvāḥ sannipatitāḥ sanniṣaṇṇāḥ bahūni ca bhagavan devanāgāni sannipatitāni sanniṣaṇṇāni |
S04n267:1513: punaścānekāni rākṣasapretānyaḍakavatyāṃ rājadhānyamāgatya sannipatitāni sanniṣaṇṇānyabhūvan dharmaśravaṇāya ||
S04n267:1514: [237] tatra khalu bhagavān bhaiṣajyasenaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamāmantrayati |
S04n267:1516: atha khalu bhaiṣajyaseno bodhisattvo mahāsattvo ṛddhibalenordhvādavatīrya yena bhagavāṃstenāṃjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantametadavocat - dharmaskandho (bhagavan)
S04n267:1520: yo brahmacaryaṃ paryeṣate brahmacaryaṃ paryeṣya sarvapāpādviramati |
S04n267:1521: paśyasi tvaṃ kulaputrāmī daharā sattvā abrahmacaryād viramanti |
S04n267:1525: āha | kenopāyena bhagavan bahūni sattvāni sannipatitāni |
S04n267:1527: [238] atha khalu bhagavāṃ bhaiṣajyasenaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamāmantrayati |
S04n267:1532: śokaduḥkhaṃ paridevaduḥkhaṃ priyaviprayogaduḥkhamapriyasaṃprayogaduḥkhaṃ maraṇaṃ tu sarvaduḥkhaṃ harate |
S04n267:1534: [239] atha khalu te daharāḥ sattvā imannirdeśaṃ śrutvā yena bhagavāṃstenāṃjalayaḥ praṇamayya bhagavantametadavocan asmākamapi bhagavan marttavyaṃ |
S04n267:1535: bhagavān āha- yuṣmābhirapi kulaputrāḥ sarvasattvaiśca martavyamiti |
S04n267:1538: bhagavān āha - maraṇakāle kulaputrāścarimavijñāne vijñānanirodho nāma vātaḥ vijñānavibhramo nāma vātaḥ vijñānasaṃkṣobhasaṃyukto nāma vātaḥ ime trayaḥ kulaputrā vātā maraṇakālasamaye carimavijñāne saṃluḍanti (saṃkṣubhanti)
S04n267:1540: ta āhu | katamāni bhagavan trīṇi maraṇakālasamaye vijñānanirodhe vartamāne śarīraṃ nirghātayanti |
S04n267:1541: bhagavān āha - śastrakaśca nāma mārṣāḥ sūcakaśca nāma mārṣāḥ ṣṭhīlakaśca nāma;
S04n267:1544: bhagavān āha - ādīptakaśca nāma mārṣā dahanavāsakaśca nāma;
S04n267:1555: [240] ta āhu | kathaṃ bhagavan mṛyate kathaṃ jīvati |
S04n267:1558: śarīraṃ nāma mārṣā mṛyate snāyukoṭībhirbaddham caturaśītibhiḥ sirākūrvasahasrai romakūpairbaddham dvādaśabhiḥ sahasrairaṃgānāṃ baddhaṃ |
S04n267:1559: ṣaṣṭyuttaraistribhiḥ śatairasthīnāṃ baddham caturaśītiḥ kṛmikulaśatānyabhyantare vasanti teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ praṇakānāṃ maraṇaṃ saṃvidyate |
S04n267:1560: maraṇanirodhaṃ ca saṃvidyate tatra sarve te prāṇakā nirāśā bhavanti |
S04n267:1561: yadā sa puruṣo mṛyate tadā sarvaprāṇakānāṃ vātasaṃkṣobhaḥ saṃluḍati anyonyaparibhākṣanārthāya tadā te duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayanti |
S04n267:1563: anye duhitṛśokaṃ jñātṛśokaṃ sarve eva te śokaśalyaviddhāḥ anyonyabhakṣaṇamārabhante |
S04n267:1566: tau saptāhamabhiyudhyataḥ yāva saptāhe'tikrānte tata ekaḥ prāṇako nirmathyate |
S04n267:1568: tat katama āyuṣmanta ucyate dharmaḥ tatkiṃ manyadhve yathā sarvaprāṇakānāṃ anyonyanirodhena maraṇaṃ |
S04n267:1573: dvau prāṇakau yudhyataḥ evameva bālapṛthagjanāḥ parasparaṃ yudhyante |
S04n267:1574: atha maraṇakālasamaye ucyate sādhu puruṣaiḥ kiṃ tvaṃ bho puruṣa viśvāsamāpadyase |
S04n267:1575: kiṃ tvayā manuṣyaloke na kiṃcidādīnavaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ |
S04n267:1576: na jātyā[d ā]dīnavo dṛṣṭaḥ na jarayā na vyādherādīnavo dṛṣṭa |
S04n267:1578: āha | dṛṣṭo me āyuṣmanta jātyā[d ā]dīnavo jarayā vyādherādīnavo dṛṣṭaḥ sarvapaścān maraṇādādīnavo dṛṣṭaḥ
S04n267:1579: āha | kathaṃ na kṛtāni yat karaṇīyāni kuśalamūlāni |
S04n267:1580: tat kathaṃ tvayā bhoḥ puruṣa na kṛtamubhayorlokayo hitasaṃvartakāni dharmaskandhakuśalamūlāni |
S04n267:1582: kathaṃ tvayā na kṛtaḥ kuśalamūlasaṃbhāraḥ yastvaṃ parimuktaḥ syājjātyā jarayā vyādhermaraṇāt tat kathaṃ te na kṛtaṃ yoniśomanasikārapratyavekṣaṇāṃ

S04n267:1974: evamukte bhagavāṃ bhaiṣajyasenaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - pṛccha tvaṃ bhaiṣajyasena yadyadevākāṃkṣasyahaṃ te tasya tasyaiva (pṛṣṭasya)
S04n267:1976: [256] evamukte bhaiṣajyaseno bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - tṛṃśatkoṭīsahasrāṇi bhagavannavakānāṃ sattvānāṃ prādurbhūtāni te tathāgatasya sūkṣmān dharmadeśanāmavagāhanti |

S04n267:1981: tathāgatasyaibhirmṛdukaṃ sukukāraṃ bhāṣitaṃ dharmaṃ śrutvā tenaite bhaiṣajyasena sarvadharmāṇāṃ arthamavabhotsyante sarvaguṇasamanvāgatāśca bhaviṣyanti |
S04n267:1987: bhaiṣajyasena āha - paśyāmi bhagavan paśyāmi sugata |
S04n267:1988: bhagavān āha - adyeme bhaiṣajyasena daharāḥ sattvāḥ eṣu kūṭāgāreṣvabhiruhya dharmābhisamayamanuprāpsyanti |
S04n267:1992: bahūnāñca nairayikānāṃ sattvānāṃ vinipātasaṃprasthitānāṃ tathāgatajñānanirdeśaṃ śrutvā sarvasaṃsāraparāṅmukhaparājayo bhaviṣyati |
S04n267:1994: srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptaṃ te ca sarvadharmasamanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti |
S04n267:1999: [258] avalokayati bhaiṣajyaseno bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ samantā caturdiśaṃ sa paśyati pūrvasyān diśi paṃcāśat koṭyo gaṃgānadīvālikāsamāni bodhisattvānāmāgacchanti |
S04n267:2000: dakṣiṇasyān diśi ṣaṣṭi koṭī gaṃgānadīvālikāsamāni bodhisattvānāmāgacchanti |
S04n267:2001: paścimasyāṃn diśi saptati koṭī gaṃgānadīvālikāsamāni bodhisattvānāmāgacchanti |
S04n267:2005: te cāgatāgatā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhagavataḥ purataḥ pādau śiraśābhivandyaikānte taśuḥ
S04n267:2006: [259] ekāntasthitānāṃ daśadigbhyāgatānāṃ bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānāmatha bhaiṣajyaseno bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - kimetad bhagavan khaga-m-antarīkṣe kṛṣṇarūpaṃ lohitarūpaṃ (ca) paśyāmi |
S04n267:2008: na saṃjānāsi yadetadantarīkṣe kṛṣṇarūpaṃ lohitarūpaṃ ca paśyasi |
S04n267:2009: āha | na jānāmi bhagavan na jānāmi sugata |

S04n267:2011: māro'yaṃ bhaiṣajyasena vicakṣuskaraṇāyehopasaṃkrāntaḥ icchasi bhaiṣajyasenaitān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān draṣṭuṃ ya ete khagāntarīkṣe vyavasthitāḥ
S04n267:2013: [260] atha bhagavāṃstān bodhisattvān darśayitvā bhaiṣajyasenaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamāmantrayati sma |
S04n267:2015: āha | ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo yadete bodhisattvā etāvanta ihāgatā |
S04n267:2016: bhagavān āha - daharāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ pratyayena bhaiṣajyasena saṃprataṃ sarvasattvā dharmadhyānasamanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti |
